rows.label: bf02230100_0010
rows.name:
Special Inquisitor Meleph! To what do
we owe this extreme pleasure?

rows.label: bf02230100_0020
rows.name:
Had we but heard of Your Grace's visit
we could have prepared a suitable...

rows.label: bf02230100_0030
rows.name:
I don't stand on ceremony, Consul.
I'd rather you just did your job.

rows.label: bf02230100_0040
rows.name: Y-your Grace?

rows.label: bf02230100_0050
rows.name:
Someone of your standing deserves
to be treated as such!

rows.label: bf02230100_0060
rows.name: You are His Majesty's representative!

rows.label: bf02230100_0070
rows.name:
Please permit us to lay on a meal
befitting Your Grace.

rows.label: bf02230100_0080
rows.name: Until then, we would be honored if-

rows.label: bf02230100_0090
rows.name:
You made impressive time. I wasn't
expecting you until tomorrow.

rows.label: bf02230100_0100
rows.name: K-Kagutsuchi-sama!

rows.label: bf02230100_0110
rows.name:
If we have found the Holy Grail then
there is no time to waste.

rows.label: bf02230100_0120
rows.name:
But I fear the passage has
taken its toll on our engines.

rows.label: bf02230100_0130
rows.name: The Holy Grail? H-how do you-?!

rows.label: bf02230100_0140
rows.name: Is there a problem, Morph-kun?

rows.label: bf02230100_0150
rows.name: N-not at all, Your Grace.

rows.label: bf02230100_0160
rows.name: Good. Now, you've captured a Driver from Iira.

rows.label: bf02230100_0170
rows.name: Where is she being held?

rows.label: bf02230100_0180
rows.name: Wha-? Why do you want-

rows.label: bf02230100_0190
rows.name:
Morph-kun.
I don't remember asking for your opinion.

rows.label: bf02230100_0200
rows.name:
Y-yes, Your Grace! I'll take you to
her right away!
